meaningMnemonic: To a <radical>narwhal</radical>, a <radical>towel</radical> is just normal <kanji>cloth</kanji>. They're always wet so towel cloth is all they know.
readingMnemonic: If you use this type of <kanji>cloth</kanji> for your clothes and blankets people will call you a <reading>foo</reading>l (ふ). They think you're a fool who can't tell the difference between human cloth and towel cloth.
